divs: Sighting Detailsafter me and my family came back from shopping i step out of the car. Like most nights i come home late i looked up at the sky and looked for stars but when i looked up.I saw some triangle like craft hovering so steady i wanted to say look to my family but at the time. I was stunned for about a minute and then this craft with three red lights rotated and almost in a instant the three. Lights disapeard so later i thought it was a plane but i soon relized that no man made plane that i knew of cloud go that speed.
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around October 14th 2009
